<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/agents/{agentId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Permanently deletes an agent

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"agentId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"ID of the agent to delete"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
